rules: Rule1: Provided that payment for the order is processed, then if the order is not completed, the customer's age is verified.
Rule2: Whenever the order is timely delivered, the customer is satisfied follows.
Rule3: The order is timely delivered or the order has damaged goods.
Rule4: Under the condition that a complaint is filed by the customer, a refund is not issued to the customer.
Rule5: A complaint is filed by the customer or the customer leaves a positive review.
Rule6: If the customer leaves a positive review, then a refund is not issued to the customer.
Rule7: Provided that the order is delivered, then the order is completed.
Rule8: Whenever a driver is assigned to the order, the order is delivered follows.
Rule9: If the order is for self pickup, then the order is delivered.
Rule10: Under the condition that the employee is an experienced driver, a driver is assigned to the order.
Rule11: If the employee is a new driver, then the order is for self pickup.
Rule12: The delivery route is optimized, or the employee is an experienced driver, or the employee is a new driver.
Rule13: If traffic conditions are good, then an alternative route is available for the delivery route.
Rule14: Traffic conditions are good or traffic conditions are bad.
Rule15: Under the condition that traffic conditions are bad, the delivery route is not optimized.
Rule16: If an alternative route is available for the delivery route, then the delivery route is not optimized.
Rule17: Whenever the cold chain is maintained for the food item, then either the food item is temperature controlled or the food item is not in proper storage.
Rule18: Provided that the food item has insulated packaging, then either the food item is temperature controlled or the food item is not in proper storage.
Rule19: If the food item passed the quality check, then either the cold chain is maintained for the food item or the food item has insulated packaging.
Rule20: Under the condition that the food item passed the visual inspection, then either the cold chain is maintained for the food item or the food item has insulated packaging.
Rule21: Whenever the restaurant passed the health inspection, the restaurant is food safety certified follows.
Rule22: The restaurant passed the health inspection or the restaurant staff is trained.
Rule23: If the restaurant staff is trained, then either the food item passed the quality check or the food item passed the visual inspection.
Rule24: Provided that the driver has a valid driver's license, then either the delivery vehicle has insurance or the order is completed.
Rule25: Under the condition that the driver completed training, the driver passed the background check.
Rule26: If the driver is experienced, then if the driver does not have a valid driver's license, the driver completed training.
Rule27: The driver is experienced or the driver is new.
Rule28: Provided that the driver is new, then if the driver does not have a valid driver's license, the driver completed training.

Rule29: If customization is requested for the order, then if the customer preferences are met for the order, then either the order has special instructions or if the order is delivery scheduled, then payment for the order is processed.
Rule30: Under the condition that the customer has special dietary needs, the order is from the standard menu.
Rule31: If the customer has special dietary needs, then the order is not from the standard menu.
Rule32: The customer has special dietary needs or customization is requested for the order.
Rule33: Provided that payment for the order is confirmed, payment for the order is processed.
Rule34: Payment for the order is by cash, or if payment for the order is authorized, then payment for the order is confirmed.
Rule35: If alcohol delivery for the order is approved, then if the order is not completed, the alcohol product's content is not verified.
Rule36: Provided that alcohol verification for the order is skipped, then if the order is not completed, the alcohol product's content is not verified.
Rule37: The food item contains fresh ingredients, or the food item is temperature controlled, or the food item is not in proper storage.
Rule38: Under the condition that the customer's ID is verified, the customer's age is verified.
Rule39: Under the condition that a government ID is presented by the customer, a signature is obtained from the customer.
Rule40: Whenever the ID scan for the customer is completed, the customer is of legal drinking age follows.
Rule41: If a signature is obtained from the customer, then the ID scan for the customer is completed.
Rule42: Provided that manual navigation is used by the driver, there is no GPS malfunction in the navigation system.
Rule43: Weather conditions are good, or if it is not the case that if contact is made with the customer then delivery for the order is attempted, then delivery for the order did not fail.
Rule44: If weather conditions are bad, then weather conditions are not good.
Rule45: Whenever there is road construction on the delivery route, the delivery route is not optimized.
Rule46: If the delivery vehicle has a breakdown, then a backup vehicle is not available in the delivery fleet.
Rule47: Under the condition that maintenance is scheduled for the delivery vehicle, then if the delivery vehicle has a breakdown, a backup vehicle is available in the delivery fleet.
Rule48: Whenever the customer's age is verified, the alcohol product's content is not verified.
Rule49: If emergency repair is performed on the delivery vehicle, then if the delivery vehicle has a breakdown, a backup vehicle is available in the delivery fleet.
Rule50: The fleet manager is notified of the incident, or maintenance is scheduled for the delivery vehicle, or emergency repair is performed on the delivery vehicle.
Rule51: Whenever the order is delivery scheduled, payment for the order is authorized follows.
Rule52: The order is delivery scheduled or the order is pickup scheduled.
Rule53: Provided that the order is pickup scheduled, then if the order is not completed, the customer's age is verified.
Rule54: If it is not the case that either the delivery vehicle has insurance or the order is completed, then the delivery vehicle has valid registration.
Rule55: If it is not the case that either the order has special instructions or if the order is delivery scheduled then payment for the order is processed, then the order is for standard delivery.

Rule56: Provided that it is not the case that either the order has special instructions or if the order is delivery scheduled then payment for the order is processed, the order is not for standard delivery.
Rule57: If it is not the case that if the order has damaged goods then the order is not delivered within the deadline, then a refund is issued to the customer.
Rule58: Whenever it is not the case that if traffic conditions are good then there is road construction on the delivery route, the delivery vehicle has a breakdown.
Rule59: If it is not the case that either alcohol delivery for the order is approved or alcohol verification for the order is skipped, then the customer is underage.
Rule60: Under the condition that it is not the case that either alcohol delivery for the order is approved or alcohol verification for the order is skipped, the customer's ID is verified.
Rule61: Provided that it is not the case that if the customer's age is verified then the customer is not underage, a government ID is presented by the customer.
Rule62: If it is not the case that if contact is made with the customer then delivery for the order is attempted, then delivery for the order failed.

Rule63: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that either the delivery vehicle has insurance or the order is completed then the delivery vehicle does not have valid registration, then the food item is in proper storage.

Rule64: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if traffic conditions are good then the delivery route is not optimized then there is a route deviation for the delivery route, there is a GPS malfunction in the navigation system.

Rule65: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if traffic conditions are good then the delivery route is not optimized then there is a route deviation for the delivery route, then manual navigation is used by the driver.
Rule66: Whenever it is not the case that if the order is not delivered then the customer is not available, contact is made with the customer follows.
Rule67: If the order is not delivered, then the customer is available.
Rule68: Whenever the order is not completed, the order is delivered within the deadline follows.
Rule69: Provided that the order is not completed, the alcohol product's content is verified.
facts: Fact1: The customer preferences are met for the order.
Fact3: The delivery vehicle does not have insurance.
Fact4: The order does not have special instructions.
Fact5: The customer is not satisfied.
Fact6: The restaurant is not food safety certified.
Fact7: The driver did not pass the background check.
Fact8: The food item is not temperature controlled.
Fact9: Payment for the order is not by cash.
Fact10: The food item does not contain fresh ingredients.
Fact11: The customer is not of legal drinking age.
Fact12: There is no route deviation for the delivery route.
Fact13: Delivery for the order is not attempted.
Fact14: The fleet manager is not notified of the incident.
